trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您處理多個具有一個事件處理常式的事件類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>屬性，以判斷哪些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>事件發生 for...in</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel a tab change in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消索引標籤變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，將<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的執行個體的屬性值已初始化為指定的參數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the tab change by default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>根據預設，取消索引標籤的變更否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
